import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./LoginForm.css"; class LoginForm extends Component { api_POST() { var T = document.getElementById("city"); var o_City = T.options[T.selectedIndex].text; T = document.getElementById("rating"); var o_Rating = T.options[T.selectedIndex].text; var T = document.getElementById("type"); var o_Type = T.options[T.selectedIndex].text; alert(T2); const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ City: '', Rating: '', Type: '',}) }; fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/json/call', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ postId: data.id })); } render() { return(
this.api_POST()}>
